title: Who sings the song 'Sunday Morning'? - Quora

response.answer_text: There’s a bunch! But they’re not covers, they are all different songs! In order of my best guess on how likely it is to be the one you’re thinking of:-Year, Band, Style, Subject-In 2004, Maroon 5, jazzy pop, something about the rain and lying in bed with somebodyIn 1997, No Doubt, fast ska-ish, about a nasty breakupIn 1966, Velvet Underground, about paranoia…. maybe?? This one has been covered numerous timesin 2007, k-os, percussion heavy rock-hop, I don’t know what this one is about exactly, but it’s super catchyIn 1993, Earth, Wind and Fire, r&b with lots of horns, looking forward to meeting a loverin 2006, Utada Hikaru, but it’s in Japanese, relaxing on the weekend with your ambiguously-not-quite-boyfriendThere’s actually a ton more, but I feel it’s unlikely that you’re thinking of those, also, I don’t know enough to tell you about them myself.
